```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(rio)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)


```


```{r load data}

pth <- here("data", "rstats_tweets.rds")
data <- import(pth)

```

```{r commit 2}

#data cleaning 
screen_name_data <- data %>% 
  select(screen_name) %>% 
  count(screen_name) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  slice(1:25) %>% 
  mutate(screen_name = fct_reorder(screen_name, n))

#plot commit 2

ggplot(screen_name_data, aes(x = screen_name, y = n)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    coord_flip()

```
```{r commit 3}
ggplot(screen_name_data, aes(x = screen_name, y = n)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    coord_flip()+ labs(title = "Most prolific #rtats tweeters", x = "Twitter Screen Name", y = "Count")
```
